data.title: Los Angeles 2021
data.meta_description: Los Angeles 2021 is a group of five Monster Jam events that were held at the then Staples Center in Los Angeles, California through July 23rd-25th, 2021. This event was notable for featuring the return of various trucks and drivers in Monster Jam for the first time since March 2020, before the...
data.text:
Los Angeles 2021 is a group of five Monster Jam events that were held at the then Staples Center in Los Angeles, California through July 23rd-25th, 2021. This event was notable for featuring the return of various trucks and drivers in Monster Jam for the first time since March 2020, before the COVID-19 put them on hiatus.

Lineup[]

Alien Invasion - Bernard Lyght

El Toro Loco - Armando Castro

Grave Digger #41 - Brandon Vinson

Obsessed - Eric Swanson

Scooby-Doo! - Linsey Read

Son-uva Digger - Ryan Anderson

Wild Card - Daron Basl

Zombie - Brittany Marcotte

Results[]

Show 1 - Son-uva Digger

Show 2 - El Toro Loco

Show 3 - Alien Invasion

Show 4 - El Toro Loco

Show 5 - Son-uva Digger

Show 1 - El Toro Loco

Show 2 - Son-uva Digger

Show 3 - El Toro Loco

Show 4 - Son-uva Digger

Show 5 - El Toro Loco

Show 3 - Grave Digger

Show 4 - Scooby-Doo!

Show 5 - Scooby-Doo!

Overall points[]

Grave Digger - 121

Son-uva Digger - 120

Scooby-Doo! - 111

El Toro Loco - 106

Zombie - 77

Alien Invasion - 70

Wild Card - 43

Obsessed - 41

Trivia[]

This event marked the return of various truck and drivers in Monster Jam after the COVID-19 pandemic put them on hiatus.

This event featured the return of both Bernard Lyght and the Alien Invasion truck.

This event featured the return of both Armando Castro and El Toro Loco truck.

This event featured the return of Brandon Vinson, Brittany Marcotte and Daron Basl.

This event featured the return of the Son-uva Digger truck with Ryan Anderson returning to the truck after driving Bakugan Dragonoid for the first half of 2021.

This would be the final event at the venue with its name as the Staples Center before being renamed to the Crypto.com Arena in December 2021.
